content.rendered:
project
Walltexx
client
Abhijeet Rraut
location
Nagpur, India
duration
10 Days

branding

Walltexx is a premium home decor brand offering a wide range of solutions, including curtains, furnishings, and interior decor accessories. Their mission is to transform both residential and commercial spaces into elegant and functional works of art.
concept
Creating a logo that highlights Walltex’s innovation in furniture and decor, blending modernity with timeless appeal.
challenge
The challenge was to craft a design that highlighted Walltexx’s versatility in decor while maintaining a luxurious and modern appeal.
solution
We developed a bold and sophisticated logo that combined modern typography with iconic decor elements. The branding effectively communicates Walltexx’s identity as a trusted name in transforming spaces with style and quality

company profile
